title: Minecraft Java版 19w14a 发布
author: Halcyon_Suoh
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小草—c_t_l 于 2019-4-4 17:28 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.14 仍未发布，19w14a为其第31个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。




MINECRAFT SNAPSHOT 19W13AA Village & Pillage Java SnapshotJava版1.14快照19w14a
In this week's snapshot we have a big pile of bugfixes. But honestly, why would you play this when the greatest game of all time was rediscovered just this very week?这周的快照有一吨的漏洞修复。说真的，你为什么不去玩玩这周重见天日的世界第一的游戏呢？
CHANGES IN 19W14A19w14a变更列表
Cats can now spawn naturally in villages and not just upon world generation猫现可在村庄内自然生成，而非仅限在世界生成时生成。Knock knock. Who's there? Not a pillager because they can no longer open doors...敲敲敲。谁？至少不是掠夺者，因为它们再也不能开门了…Lots of bug fixes!一 吨 漏 洞 修 复！

FIXED BUGS IN 19W14A19w14a漏洞修复
MC-2518 - No -breaking sound or- particle effect for some tools and all armor修复：部分工具及全部盔甲缺失被破坏声及粒子效果。MC-10369 - Server side particle spawning does not create particles for client修复：在服务端生成的粒子在客户端不可见。MC-66206 - Beacon color change delayed if the beam passes through water, cobweb, leaves修复：信标光柱在穿过水/蜘蛛网/树叶时，颜色更改带延迟。MC-90594 - Player can stop sneaking/gliding without space to stand up修复：玩家可在头顶无空余空间可供站起时取消潜行/滑翔。MC-113898 - Water below lily pads is replaced by wooden planks village paths修复：荷叶下的水被村庄的木板路覆盖。MC-121105 - Beacon beam color update is slow when too far away from the beacon block修复：当远离信标时，信标光柱颜色更新过慢。MC-121148 - Polar bears are required in "Monster hunter" advancement, but are not completely hostile修复：击杀北极熊可达成“怪物猎人”成就。MC-125774 - The player keeps its 1 block height of swimming animation when going out of water修复：玩家在游泳动画下离开水时仍保持一格高。MC-127238 - Beacon colors don't update as frequently anymore修复：信标光柱颜色更新不频繁。MC-129863 - "Crawling" underneath glass/grass paths/other transparent blocks causes bugs修复：在透明方块下“爬行”会导致玩家卡在方块内。MC-131116 - Re-entering water while in a crawling state can cause the player to visually stand up修复：在“爬行”动画内重新进入水会导致玩家看起来为站立状态。MC-133042 - Block of grass that grew from dirt under snow is not snowy修复：当草方块传染至雪片下的泥土时，雪片下被传染的草方块上无雪。MC-137595 - Podzol generates below other blocks修复：灰化土在方块下生成。MC-137734 - Bamboo can generate on melon修复：竹子可在西瓜上生成。MC-138751 - "Fullscreen Resolution" setting cannot be adjusted修复：无法调整全屏分辨率。MC-138795 - Tamed cats with CatType:0 become wild ocelots upon upgrading to 1.14 snapshots修复：带有CatType:0的被驯服的猫在升级存档到1.14快照时变为野生豹猫。MC-139427 - Glass appears dark next to full blocks修复：玻璃在方块旁时会制造阴影。MC-139429 - The 'b' in "Jigsaw block" is lowercase修复："Jigsaw block"(拼图方块)的b为小写。MC-139478 - Buffet Floating Islands worlds generate dirt instead of grass修复：自定义浮岛世界生成泥土而非草方块。MC-139706 - Pillager-Outposts doesn't spawn in Superflat-Worlds修复：掠夺者前哨站在超平坦世界中不生成。MC-139756 - Village has a pillager outpost修复：掠夺者前哨站在村庄中生成。MC-139841 - Using /locate to find pillager outposts in a superflat world freezes the game修复：使用/locate在超平坦世界中寻找掠夺者前哨站会导致游戏无响应。MC-140307 - Curses on the second item are lost when repairing in a grindstone修复：使用砂轮修复装备时，第二件装备的“诅咒”附魔会被移除。MC-140331 - New village structures can overlap each other修复：新村庄结构可以互相覆盖。MC-140355 - Vex attacks Witch修复：恼鬼会被动攻击巫师。MC-141986 - Stronghold can generate above surface修复：要塞会在地表生成。MC-142256 - Lighting/worldgenerator issue: black patches and dark spots appearing in the world修复：光照/世界生成问题：世界上存在无光照的黑斑。MC-142692 - World loading progress becomes black after 100%修复：世界加载进度在达到100%后变黑。MC-142735 - Incorrect/Different '/data modify' behavior修复："/data modify"行为错误/不同。MC-143092 - "Left click" or "Q" in a recipe of slab in an stonecutter results in loss of items修复：在切石机内点击右键/Q会导致丢失物品。MC-143131 - Soul sand doesn't conduct redstone修复：灵魂沙不传导红石信号。MC-143280 - Stonecutter result slot doesn't allow fast clicks修复：切石机输出栏不允许双击。MC-143403 - Items can glitch through solid blocks修复：物品可以卡出方块。MC-144314 - Fox hitbox is shifted修复：狐狸的碰撞箱与模型不符。MC-144537 - Loading screen appears while changing mipmap levels修复：更改mipmap等级时出现加载界面。MC-144610 - Spawn chunks are lazy chunks修复：出生点区块弱加载。MC-144678 - Entities don't interact with the world far from the player修复：远离玩家的生物不与世界交互。MC-144685 - Ender dragon will shoot at players in creative修复：末影龙会朝创造模式的玩家吐火球。MC-145002 - When trying to join a world, the loading screen gets stuck at 100%修复：试图进入世界时，加载界面卡在100%。MC-145262 - Entities get stuck in the void when render distance is below 12修复：渲染距离低于12时，实体会卡在虚空。MC-145438 - Arrows and tridents spawned with /summon in a world spawn point too far from (0,0) causes game performance to plummet修复：在远离(0,0)的世界出生点生成三叉戟/箭实体会导致巨大掉tps。MC-145675 - Ringing bell doesn't render hand swing animation修复：敲钟时没有挥手动画。MC-145686 - java.util.NoSuchElementException ticking entity crash when a workstation is destroyed immediately after a villager within a 1-block radius has taken the job matching the workstation修复：村民在工作站点变更职业会导致java.util.NoSuchElementException ticking entity崩溃。MC-145705 - Placing a block next to a bell causes the block to appear then instantly disappear修复：在钟旁放方块会导致该方块出现后瞬间消失。MC-145716 - Pillager outpost watchtower fails to generate修复：掠夺者前哨战不生成。MC-145737 - Clicking bell with non-placable item carried play twice sound修复：手持不可放置的物品点击钟会播放两次声音。MC-145772 - Large amount of free work sites can cause lag when introducing new villagers修复：大量的空闲工作站点会导致卡顿。MC-145798 - Pressing space/enter in book and quill changes page修复：在书与笔钟按空格会翻页。MC-145862 - Villagers try to sleep in occupied beds修复：村民试图在被占用的床上睡觉。MC-145890 - Tab overrides command block suggestions while turned off修复：在命令方块内使用自动补全会使焦点按钮改变。MC-145971 - Chat message text box can be unfocused修复：聊天框可失焦。MC-146067 - You can trade with sleeping villagers修复：可以与睡觉的村民交易。MC-146168 - Pressing enter in the name or seed field on the create world dialog no longer creates the world修复：在世界生成界面的世界名/种子内输出空格会导致世界不生成。MC-146215 - Error executing task on Client: Playing level event修复：创建世界后出现Playing level event错误。MC-146225 - Lava buckets empty with no effect when placed on ladders修复：岩浆桶倒在梯子上除了岩浆桶变空外无事发生。MC-146248 - Cut Sandstone & Cut Red Sandstone cannot be shift-clicked on the stonecutter修复：錾制沙石与錾制红沙石无法在切石机内使用shift点击取出。MC-146254 - Loom bottom uses loom top texture修复：织布机的底部使用loom_top材质。MC-146272 - Double screen bounce with new sneak/crouch changes修复：创造模式飞行中使用shift下降高度会导致放开shift时屏幕颤抖。MC-146288 - Mobs bodies rotate almost instantly to the direction they're looking修复：生物身体瞬间转向其所看的方向。MC-146293 - Some planks in village bridges appear one block too high修复：村庄内的某些木板高出一格。MC-146297 - Sounds can be heard very far away修复：声音可在很远就被听到。MC-146316 - Ender dragon disappears after being spawned with /summon修复：使用/summon生成末影龙会导致其消失。MC-146331 - Mobs heads can't turn left/right while they're moving修复：生物的头可在行走时转动。MC-146332 - Player can stop sneaking while standing in a 1.5 blocks tall space修复：玩家可在1.5格高的空间内取消潜行。MC-146519 - Game freezes while villager looks for point of interest over void修复：当工作站点/会议地点位于直通虚空的洞上时，会导致游戏卡顿。MC-146520 - Player can't move a minecart in any direction except forward修复：玩家无法将矿车侧移/后移。MC-146521 - Villagers move while trading修复：村民在交易时走动。MC-146614 - Oak saplings can appear in chests in savanna villages修复：橡树树苗在热带草原村庄的箱子内生成。MC-146776 - Typo in Difficulty lock (Difficulity lock)修复："Difficulty lock"拼写错误(Difficulity lock)。MC-146784 - When you right click on the bell with a snow in the hand the block of grass turns white without snow on top修复：手持雪片敲钟会导致玩家一侧的草方块变白。MC-146789 - Grass turns to dirt when there is snow above it修复：被雪覆盖的草方块变回泥土。MC-146792 - Vindicators and ravagers don't attack players, villagers and iron golems during raids修复：卫道士与掠夺兽在劫掠中不攻击玩家/村民/铁傀儡。MC-146804 - Not able to right click for more options in crafting menu修复：无法在合成菜单中右键来选择变种。MC-146810 - Villagers stay in houses forever when I ring the bell修复：一旦鸣钟，村民将永远躲在房子里。MC-146840 - When signing a book and quill, the next arrow button is visible修复：给书与笔签名时，“下一页”箭头仍可见。MC-146863 - Shakespearean English's name occludes its own selection box修复：Shakespearean English超出选择框。MC-146876 - Vindicators display wooden axes when they spawn in raids修复：在劫掠中生成的卫道士显示其持有木斧。MC-146927 - Cannot place a bell when aiming at the side of a block it cannot be placed on修复：无法在钟无法挂在的方块旁放置钟。MC-146932 - Pillagers, ravagers and vindicators on raids ignore players修复：掠夺者/掠夺兽/卫道士在劫掠中无视玩家。MC-147003 - Villager's don't randomly look at other mobs anymore修复：村民不再随机看向其他生物了。MC-147041 - Fletcher dropping uncraftable tipped arrows for gift (hero of the village loot table)修复：制箭师会给予玩家不可合成的药水箭来作为礼物。MC-147060 - Client freezes if a nearby player swims in water while flying with elytra修复：附近的玩家在水里游泳的同时滑翔时会导致客户端无响应。MC-147061 - Kelp gets destroyed all at the same time when the bottom block is broken, unlike sugar cane, bamboo, and cactus修复：不像甘蔗/竹子/仙人掌，破坏最底部的海带会导致整颗海带瞬间全部被破坏。MC-147152 - Invalid move player packet received / teleporting player to NaN crashes worldsave修复：收到非法的玩家移动数据包/传送会导致存档崩溃。







正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.jar
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft  1.14（村庄与掠夺更新）特性列表 的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。但由于亚马逊服务器https连接在国内时常不稳定，官方启动器下载游戏可能需要魔法上网。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）

replies.author: Chelover_C60
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 CHElover_C60 于 2019-4-4 11:09 编辑 
MC-146519 - Game freezes while villager looks for point of interest over void
修复：当村民尝试在虚空寻找 工作地点或会议地点时，会导致游戏卡顿(为什么这是个屏蔽词)
这样是不是好一些

在英文wiki 19w11a里找到了以下内容
points_of_interest (includes job_site_poi and meeting_site_poi)

replies.author: Halcyon_Suoh
replies.txt_content:
CHElover_C60 发表于 2019-4-4 10:59
修复：当村民尝试在虚空寻找 工作地点或会议地点时，会导致游戏卡顿(为什么这是个屏蔽词)
这样是不是好一 ...Placing a point of interest block with air under it going all the way down to the void, while a villager is nearby, freezes the game for a bit.
有理 感谢建议

replies.author: gao-ji
replies.txt_content: 同时添加一大堆新（老）特性
我不太喜欢我的世界更新太快，要更，我认为还是要大改动
